content: HIT-SC Screen tube Modular composite mesh sleeves for masonry fastenings ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Standard 50 mm and 85 mm lengths can be used individually or clicked together for deeper embedment applications Simply push the anchor rod into the sleeve The centering ring holds the anchor rod in place and stops mortar backflow out of the sleeve No need to keep a large number of different sleeves in stock Performance is equal to or better than that of metal mesh sleeves Applications Typical applications include sun blinds, awnings, electrical installations, sanitary installations, handrails, banisters, railings, window grating and gates ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Plastic Environmental conditions: Outdoor Base materials: Masonry (hollow) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Plastic | Environmental conditions | Outdoor | Base materials | Masonry (hollow) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (masonry) | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 375979 - Sleeve HIT-SC 12X50 (1/4x1-5/16) - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT SC 12X50 Mesh sleeve - 375980 - Sleeve HIT-SC 12X85 (1/4x3-3/8) - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT SC 12X85 Mesh sleeve -
